scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.generate:api: npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./openapi/frontendapi.yaml -g typescript-axios -o ./src/frontendapi && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./openapi/backendapi.yaml -g typescript-axios -o ./src/backendapi
